johny.ringescape.server
Class HitTask

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      johny.ringescape.server.HitTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, AppConstants
public class HitTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
implements AppConstants

Checks if the player escaped after the ESCAPE_TIME passes. Changes the status of the victim either to FREE if he escaped or to IMPRISONED if not. Adds reward points either to the victim if he escaped or to the hitter if the victim got imprisoned. Also, starts a PrisonTask if the victim got imprisoned.
